participant_1.background:
I live with my mother in a small town in the Midwest.
i am an army ranger.
i work part time in the campus library.
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.
i currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend.

participant_2.background:
I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job.
i like to play basketball.
i have went to mexico 4 times this year.
i like lizards.
i like to go on walks.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to?
Just got home from playing basketball. What about you?
I am on my way home from work. I work at the campus library.
Cool, I am a student at the local community college.
That's great! I am in the army and I am stationed at the nearby base.
That's awesome! I have always wanted to join the military but I am not sure if I could handle it.
It's not easy, but it is worth it. I love being a soldier and serving my country.
That's great to hear. I am glad you are happy with your job.
Thank you, I am. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play basketball, go for walks, and hang out with my friends and family.
That sounds great. I love to go for walks too. I also like to read and watch movies.
I love to read as well! I am currently reading a book about the history of the military.
That sounds interesting! I might have to check that book out.
It is a great book! I am sure you would enjoy it.
I am going to have to check it out. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice night.
